name: EXCLUSIVE - The Sunflower (Editions: 1/1)
description: This Sunflower oil painting was painted by the artist MVP (Brazil) and it has been in her possession since the years 2000. The plastic artist MVP (Brazil) is making available her oil paintings painted between the years 1980 and 2000 by transforming it into NFT, in this way, this painting will be unique and exclusive by the new collector. Contact: marcelovpessoa@gmail.com
